overview:
Richie is an Internet media executive and entrepreneur whose career spans the online marketing and social media industry. He is the Chairman of inSparq.com, a referral marketing platform for ecommerce. He is also a Managing Director at Stockton Equity, an investment firm focused on special situations and distressed acquisitions in the digital media and direct marketing industries. He previously led the acquisition of Bebo from AOL and oversaw its turnaround.

Prior to Bebo, Richard founded founded a number of direct marketing and online advertising companies and cofounded the first nonprofit on Facebook. Richard holds a BS in Finance from Binghamton University.
